gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels is set to be sunny, with an average temperature of 25.2°C, peaking at 30°C and no chance of rain. This is consistent with Meteoblue's forecast of 79°F (about 26°C) and no rain. A perfect day for a café terrace, just don't forget your sunscreen!
